title: PBE account currently disabled
body: i have a PBE account since 2 years ago,and i been play it very offend, but now when i try to login this account its shows :" this account is currently disabled. and i try to contact the player support but its not really help me

replies.body: Did you encounter issues when you reached out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)? We'll have to do some investigating to resolve this, so I definitely recommend you submit a ticket if you haven't already done so.
anway to fix it besides sending help? Is this a type of ban or something?
